instruction: Write pseudo-code for a bubble sort algorithm
output:
procedure bubbleSort( A : list of sortable items )
  n = length(A)
  repeat 
    swapped = false
    for i = 1 to n-1 inclusive do
      if A[i-1] > A[i] then
        swap(A[i-1], A[i])
        swapped = true
      end if
    end for
    n = n - 1
  until not swapped
end procedure
